TextView.android:text: This is similar to the classic X and O game instead there are two colored coins a red one and a yellow one . It is a two player game and the first player will take yellow(similar to x) and the next player will take red (similar to o) as their coins. As you tap on the respective boxes the coin will drop down and fill the place the player who gets three similar coins in a same row or column or the diagonal will be announced as he winner. And You can also play again after winning/Losing the game.

This is an enhanced version of Classic X and O game where there are two colored coins a red one and a yellow one . It is a two player game and the first player will take yellow(similar to x) and the next player will take red (similar to o) as their coins. As you tap on the respective boxes the coin will drop down and fill the place. The additional changes to this game is that the Player can place the coin in an already occupied position.The player who gets three similar coins in a same row or column or the diagonal will be announced as he winner. And You can also play again after winning/Losing the game.

This is the Classic version of the board game Connect.Where there will be two Coins or coumters which will be dropped from the top and it reaches to the bottom of the board until it reaches the filled slot or the end of the board.As you tap on the respective boxes the coin will drop down and fill the empty places until it reaches a filled slot.The player who gets three similar coins in a same row or column or the diagonal will be announced as he winner. And You can also play again after winning/Losing the game.
